content: repost to here// i'll have a clear and define answer for the situation that happened sometime before August 28th, because thats when i start school. im still collecting information and highlighting important stuff and, yknow, that takes a while. it's a bit dumb for me to do this but i feel like having a well thought answer considering stuff from both sides will help. if you have any screenshots or info at all, it would be appreciated very much
